text: MacArthur is a 1977 World War II biographical drama movie directed by Joseph Sargent with Gregory Peck playing the part of Douglas MacArthur and stars Ed Flanders and Dan O'Herlihy. It was released on July 15, 1977 by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1977 drama movies Category:1970s biographical movies Category:1977 war movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American drama movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies set in the Philippines Category:Movies directed by Joseph Sargent Category:1970s English-language movies Category:Movies composed by Jerry Goldsmith Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies about security and surveillance Category:Movies about the United States Armed Forces
title: MacArthur (movie)
